)\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily  \mbox{[}virtual\mbox{]}}}}
\label{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1P300UndoHandler_a738247ff99ffd57574e4e431a5b78007}
Each class inheriting from this interface should implement this method. It defines what the \hyperlink{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1GObserver}{GObserver} will do in case it is notified by the \hyperlink{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1GObservable}{GObservable} 
\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em observable} & the \hyperlink{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1GObservable}{GObservable} object that is observed \\
\hline
{\em pUserData} & the event/message/data that is send by the \hyperlink{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1GObservable}{GObservable} object to the \hyperlink{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1GObserver}{GObserver} \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}


Implements \hyperlink{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1GObserver_a798ae875586bc6cf2c636272a97522f5}{OpenViBEApplications::GObserver}.
